td.span: Exchange Rate for VAT Purpose @ Total in AED :

tr.td: Invoice should be paid in full inclusive of all bank charge. Shortpaid amount will be shown as outstanding. Foreign Currency transfers through Exchange houses are not acceptable. Omega DOES NOT change bank accounts on short notice and all changes will be communicated in advance by written communication on Omega company letterhead through mail courier/post and not email / phone.
